item.title: 苹果公司公布创纪录的 1100 亿美元回购计划，业绩超出低预期
item.description: 周四，苹果公司的季度业绩和预测略超预期，这家 iPhone 制造商公布了一项创纪录的股票回购计划，使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 6%。【原文：Apple's quarterly results and forecast beat modest expectations on Thursday, as the iPhone maker unveiled a record share buyback program, sending its stock up 6% in extended trade.】

item.title: 美国国税局大幅提高对大公司、合伙企业和百万富翁的审计率
item.description: 美国国税局周四表示，计划在未来三年内大幅提高对大公司、合伙企业和千万富翁的审计率，同时加大执法支出和招聘力度，以提高税收。【原文：The Internal Revenue Service said on Thursday that it plans to sharply increase audit rates for big corporations, partnerships and multimillionaires over the next three years as it ramps up enforcement spending and hiring to boost collections.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司要求赔偿，以承担亏损的 Spirit 业务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，空中客车公司要求获得经济补偿，以接管精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）亏损的业务，这一要求已成为该供应商与其主要客户波音公司达成合作协议的一个障碍。【原文：Airbus has called for financial compensation to take on money-losing operations from Spirit AeroSystems , a demand that has emerged as one obstacle to a tie-up deal between the supplier and its main customer Boeing , people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 伯克希尔董事称董事会可能不会给巴菲特继任者阿贝尔同样的回旋余地
item.description: 一位长期担任伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）董事的人士表示，有望接替沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）出任首席执行官的格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）可能无法从企业集团董事会获得同样的收购余地。【原文：A longtime Berkshire Hathaway director said Greg Abel, who is expected to succeed Warren Buffett as chief executive, may not get the same leeway from the conglomerate's board of directors to make acquisitions.】

item.title: 演唱会热潮推动门票销售，Live Nation 收入超预期
item.description: 受音乐会等现场活动大受欢迎的推动，Ticketmaster 母公司 Live Nation Entertainment 周四公布的第一季度营收超出预期，股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 3%。【原文：Ticketmaster parent Live Nation Entertainment beat estimates for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by the popularity of live events such as concerts, sending its shares up more than 3% in aftermarket trading.】

item.title: 需求持续低迷，Illumina 重申年度收入预期
item.description: Illumina 周四重申了 2024 年的收入预期，预计医学研究实验室和医院等客户的需求将持续疲软。【原文：Illumina reiterated its 2024 revenue forecast on Thursday, expecting continued weak demand from its customers such as medical research labs and hospitals.】

item.title: 怪兽饮料第一季度收入增加，原因是需求回升，成本下降
item.description: 怪物饮料公司（Monster Beverage）周四公布的第一季度财报显示，该公司第一季度营收猛增 12%，主要得益于市场对该公司高价果汁饮料的稳定需求以及货运成本的降低。【原文：Monster Beverage reported a 12% jump in first-quarter revenue on Thursday, helped by steady demand for the energy drink maker's high-priced juices as well as easing freight costs.】

item.title: 伊根-琼斯推荐诺福克南方公司代理权争夺战中的 Ancora 董事会提名人选
item.description: 代理咨询公司伊根-琼斯（Egan Jones）周四表示，建议诺福克南方公司股东投票支持激进投资者 Ancora 提名的公司董事会成员，并支持该公司更换首席执行官。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Egan Jones said on Thursday that it recommended Norfolk Southern shareholders vote for activist investor Ancora's nominees to the company's board and backed a CEO change at the railroad.】

item.title: 稳定币 Tether 加强监控，努力打击非法融资
item.description: 世界上最大的稳定币 Tether 在周四的一份声明中说，为了打击非法金融，Tether 已经加强了对其代币在更广泛的加密货币市场和支付中的使用情况的监控。【原文：The world's largest stablecoin, Tether, has stepped up monitoring of how its tokens are used in broader crypto markets and payments in a bid to combat illicit finance, Tether said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚麦格理全年利润下降 32
item.description: 由于大宗商品、全球市场和资产管理业务表现疲软，澳大利亚麦格理集团周五公布的全年利润下降了 32%。【原文：Australia's Macquarie Group posted a 32% drop in its full-year profit on Friday due to weaker performance across its commodities, global markets and asset management businesses.】

item.title: 先锋公司在被埃克森收购前报告利润下降
item.description: 先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources）周四公布，受生产成本上升和天然气价格疲软的影响，第一季度利润下降。【原文：Pioneer Natural Resources on Thursday reported a lower first-quarter profit, weighed down by higher production costs and weak natural gas prices.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场爱美联储，日元爱日本央行
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国司法部要求美国钢铁公司和新日本制铁公司就拟议合并提供更多详情
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，作为对新日铁公司拟以 150 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的反垄断审查的一部分，美国司法部正在寻求更多细节和文件材料。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice is seeking more details and documentary materials as part of an antitrust review of Nippon Steel's proposed $15 billion takeover of U.S. Steel, the American firm said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于 B2C 增长缓慢，Expedia 下调全年收入预期
item.description: 在线旅行社 Expedia 周四下调了 2024 年收入增长预期，原因是企业对消费者业务表现不佳，影响了总预订量。【原文：Online travel agency Expedia cut its 2024 revenue growth forecast on Thursday, as gross bookings were hit by poor performance in its business-to-consumer segment.】

item.title: 苹果销售额降幅低于预期，首席执行官认为将恢复增长
item.description: 苹果公司周四公布的季度营收降幅小于预期，公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）告诉路透社记者，随着未来几个月对人工智能功能的投入，公司预计本季度销售额将恢复增长。【原文：Apple on Thursday reported a smaller than expected decline in quarterly revenue, and Chief Executive Tim Cook told Reuters the company expects a return to sales growth in the current quarter as it invests in AI features to be unveiled in the coming months.】

item.title: 受国际旅游需求影响，Booking 季度利润增长
item.description: Booking Holdings 周四公布第一季度利润增长，原因是强劲的国际旅游需求抵消了美国休闲旅游需求的放缓。【原文：Booking Holdings reported higher first-quarter profit on Thursday, as strong demand for international travel offset moderating leisure travel demand in the U.S.】

item.title: MP 材料公司第一季度亏损额超出预期
item.description: 稀土矿商 MP Materials 周四公布的第一季度财报显示，受精矿销售下降和战略材料价格疲软的影响，该公司的亏损幅度超出预期。 MP 公司将从加利福尼亚州山口矿开采的岩石加工成稀土精矿。该公司是继澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）之后，中国以外的第二大稀土生产商，其稀土产量约占全球总产量的 15%。【原文：Rare earths miner MP Materials reported wider-than-expected loss in first quarter on Thursday, hurt by lower concentrate sales and weak prices of the strategic materials. MP processes rock it extracts from its Mountain Pass mine in California into rare earths concentrate. It is the second-biggest producer of rare earths outside China after Australia's Lynas Rare Earths and produces about 15% of t】

item.title: 石油产量增加，EOG 资源公司第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 由于石油和天然气公司受益于石油产量的增加，EOG Resources 周四公布的第一季度利润超出预期。【原文：EOG Resources beat first-quarter profit estimates on Thursday as the oil and gas firm benefited from higher oil production.】

item.title: 消费支出回暖，百佳超市第一季度利润大增
item.description: 杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）领导的布洛克公司（Block）周四公布第一季度利润大幅增长，原因是这家支付公司受益于消费者支出的恢复性增长和自身的成本削减。【原文：Jack Dorsey-led Block posted a jump in first-quarter profit on Thursday as the payments firm benefited from resilient consumer spending and its own cost cuts.】

item.title: 加密货币价格暴涨，Coinbase 利润飙升
item.description: Coinbase Global 第一季度利润大幅增长，这主要得益于 1 月份推出首批美国现货比特币交易所交易基金后加密货币交易量的上升。【原文：Coinbase Global posted a sizable jump in profit in the first-quarter, helped by an uptick in cryptocurrency trading following the launch of the first U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds in January.】

item.title: 受巴西和墨西哥市场推动，MercadoLibre 净利润激增
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周四表示，由于巴西和墨西哥的业绩抵消了阿根廷的一些负面影响，其第一季度净利润同比激增 71%，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Latin America e-commerce giant MercadoLibre said on Thursday its first-quarter net profit surged 71% from a year earlier, beating analysts' estimates as its performance in Brazil and Mexico offset some negative effects in Argentina.】

item.title: 安进公司第一季度利润下降 1%，收入增长 22
item.description: 安进公司周四公布的第一季度利润略有下降，原因是最近收购罕见病制药商 Horizon Therapeutics 导致运营和利息支出增加，而两位数的收入增长部分抵消了这一影响。【原文：Amgen reported a slightly lower first-quarter profit on Thursday, citing higher operating and interest expense from its recent acquisition of rare disease drugmaker Horizon Therapeutics, partially offset by double-digit revenue growth.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，收购公司 Sycamore 有意将 Nordstrom 私有化
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Sycamore Partners 是表示有意将美国百货公司 Nordstrom 私有化的收购股权公司之一。【原文：Sycamore Partners is one of the buyout equity firms that have expressed interest in taking U.S. department store Nordstrom private, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管困境加剧，美国高收益率利差依然紧缩
item.description: 美国高收益债券的利差（即公司相对于美国国债的溢价）仍然很窄，尽管该资产类别中的困境有所加剧，因为投资者认为大多数发行人都将经受更高更长期利率的考验。【原文：Spreads on U.S. high yield bonds, or the premium companies pay over U.S. Treasuries, remain tight despite a pick-up in distress within the asset class, as investors see the majority of issuers weathering higher-for-longer interest rates.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，嘉能可正在研究英美资源集团的收购方案
item.description: 两位消息人士称，大宗商品集团嘉能可正在研究收购英美资源集团（Anglo American），这一进展可能引发对这家拥有107年历史的矿业公司的竞购战。【原文：Commodities group Glencore is studying an approach for Anglo American , two sources said, a development that could spark a bidding war for the 107-year old mining company.】

item.title: Rivian 公司获得 8.27 亿美元的一揽子激励措施，以扩建伊利诺伊州的工厂
item.description: Rivian Automotive 周四表示，该公司已从伊利诺伊州获得 8.27 亿美元的奖励，用于扩大其在伊利诺伊州正常工厂的运营。【原文：Rivian Automotive said on Thursday it has received $827 million in incentives from the State of Illinois to expand operations at its Normal facility in the state.】

item.title: FCC 称许多美国电信公司需要更多资金更换华为和中兴设备
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）周四表示，近 40% 的美国电信公司需要政府提供额外资金，以便从美国无线网络中移除中国电信企业华为和中兴通讯生产的设备，以应对安全风险。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) said on Thursday nearly 40% of U.S. telecom companies need additional government funding to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦推迟就收购国家航空公司提交意向书的截止日期
item.description: 巴基斯坦私有化部长周四表示，巴基斯坦将把企业表达收购国家航空公司巴基斯坦国际航空公司意向的截止日期推迟到 5 月 18 日。【原文：Pakistan will push back the deadline for companies to express interest in buying national carrier Pakistan International Airlines to May 18, the country's privatisation minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国生产率疲软可能威胁美联储的 "软着陆 "希望
item.description: 美国第一季度生产率增幅疲软，这可能会对美联储在失业率不出现令人痛苦的上升的情况下完成通胀斗争的努力构成挑战，如果经济进一步放缓，物价方面的进展可能会停滞不前。【原文：Weaker U.S. productivity gains in the first quarter may challenge the Federal Reserve's efforts to finish its inflation fight without a painful rise in unemployment, potentially stalling progress on prices absent a further economic slowdown.】

item.title: 环球音乐集团第一季度核心盈利超出预期
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周四公布的第一季度调整后核心利润超出预期，这得益于旗下明星泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的成功。【原文：Universal Music Group on Thursday posted first-quarter adjusted core profit that beat expectations, helped by the success of its star Taylor Swift.】
